entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
